mapper.select: select ifm.id as id, ifmd.meal_id, ifm.name as ifm_name, ifmd.name as ifmd_name, ifm.description as ifm_description, ifmd.description as ifmd_description, image from in_flight_meal_tb as ifm inner join in_flight_meal_detail_tb as ifmd on ifm.id = ifmd.meal_id group by ifmd.name
select t.id as ticket_id from ticket_tb as t inner join schedule_tb as s on t.schedule_id=s.id where t.member_id=#{memberId} and s.departure_date=#{departureDate}
mapper.insert: insert into request_meal_tb(amount, meal_id, ticket_id) values(#{amount}, #{mealId}, #{ticketId})
mapper.select: select *, t.id as member_id from request_meal_tb as rm inner join in_flight_meal_tb as ifm on rm.meal_id=ifm.id inner join ticket_tb as t on rm.ticket_id=t.id where t.member_id=#{memberId} order by t.id desc

select s.departure_date, r.departure, r.destination, (t.adult_count + t.child_count) as seat_count, t.id as ticket_id from ticket_tb as t inner join schedule_tb as s on t.schedule_id = s.id inner join route_tb as r on r.id = route_id where t.member_id=#{memberId} and departure_date>now()
select (t.adult_count + t.child_count) as seat_count from ticket_tb as t inner join schedule_tb as s on t.schedule_id=s.id where t.member_id=#{memberId} and s.departure_date=#{departureDate}

select ast.flight_hours, ifs.name, ifs.description, ifs.icon_image, ifs.detail_image from available_service_tb as ast join in_flight_service_tb as ifs on ast.service_id=ifs.id where flight_hours=#{flightHours};
